import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import * as forms from '@angular/forms'; import { DataService } from 'src/app/services/data.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { profileForm = new forms.FormGroup({ name: new forms.FormControl(''), lastName: new forms.FormControl(''), }); datas: any; result: any; constructor(private service: DataService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.service.getdetails().subscribe((data) => { this.datas = data; console.log(typeof this.datas); }) } getdet(id) { this.result = this.datas.find(o => o.Id == id); console.log(this.result); //var name = document.getElementById("name"); // name.nodeValue = this.result.name; this.profileForm.get("name").setValue(this.result.name); } onSubmit(form:forms.NgForm){ } }
